Content: 593 Brigade Headquarters of the 59 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) to be in parallel with the island-wide ‘Pirith Chanting’ that has been organized to invoke blessings on the country, launched their ceremony at Kokilai Sambodhi Viharaya on Saturday (29). The overnight ‘Pirith Chanting’ ceremony was attended by 593 Brigade Commander who offered the traditional tray of betel and invited the monks to continue chanting until the following morning. All ranks in the 593 Brigade took part in the ceremony.
